pullRequest.title: Add unit tests for predictions result transformers
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue #, if available:
Description of changes:

Unit test for AWS Textract result -> Amplify model transformers
Add more unit tests for AWS Rekognition result -> Amplify model transformers
Add entities detection configuration unit tests

By submitting this pull request, I confirm that my contribution is made under the terms of the Apache 2.0 license.

commit.message: Update rekognition result transformer unit test

nodes.bodyText:
The @VisibleForTesting thing isn't ideal, and is usually used for constructor overloads.
Why not just test fetchTable, and keep this is a private implementation detail of it? If fetchTable passes your test cases, you don't really care about what happens inside this cell-processing routine.
